scripts.pre-scripts: node pre-scripts.js && shx cp ../dapper/fixture/app.json . && go build -o dapper ../dapper/main.go && go build -o server ../server/main.go
scripts.start: npm run pre-scripts && npm-run-all -p start:shared-lib start:angular-app start:electron-app
scripts.start:angular-app: wait-on workspaces/shared-lib/.dist/index.d.ts && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run start
scripts.package: npm run pre-scripts && npm run package:angular-app && npm run package:electron-app
scripts.package:angular-app: npm run package:shared-lib && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run package
scripts.make: npm run pre-scripts && npm run package:angular-app && electron-forge make
scripts.test:angular: cd workspaces/angular-app && npx ng test --watch=false --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:angular-e2e && npm run test:electron-e2e
scripts.start:angular-e2e: wait-on http://localhost:4200 && cd workspaces/angular-app && npm run cypress:run
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf .webpack out allure-results package-lock.json node_modules workspaces/shared-lib/.dist workspaces/angular-app/node_modules workspaces/angular-app/.angular workspaces/angular-app/.dist
